text: Val-de-Virieu is a commune in the Isère department in southeastern France. It was established on 1 January 2019 by merger of the former communes of Virieu (the seat) and Panissage.Arrêté préfectoral 11 October 2018, p. 275 ==See also== *Communes of the Isère department ==References== *INSEE statistics Category:Communes of Isère Category:Isère communes articles needing translation from French Wikipedia
title: Val-de-Virieu
